docTitle.titlePart:
Injectable Collagenase Clostridium
Histolyticum for Dupuytren's Contracture

byline.docAuthor:
Lawrence C. Hurst, M.D., Marie A. Badalamente, Ph.D., Vincent R. Hentz, M.D.,
Robert N. Hotchkiss, M.D., F. Thomas D. Kaplan, M.D., Roy A. Meals, M.D.,
Theodore M. Smith, Ph.D., and John Rodzvilla, M.D.,

front.note:
for the CORD I Study Group*
From the State University of New York
(SUNY) at Stony Brook, Stony Brook
(L.C.H., M.A.B.); Stanford Hospitals and
Clinics, Palo Alto, CA (V.R.H.); the Hospi-
tal for Special Surgery, New York (R.N.H.);

paedics, SUNY at Stony Brook, Health

Brook, NY 11794-8181, or at lhurst@notes.
cc.sunysb.edu.

Reduction of Dupuytren's (CORD) I Study
